title: Q&A: How to Declutter & Spot a Philly Accent
itunes:title: Q&A: How to Declutter & Spot a Philly Accent
description:
PANTS with Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey

Produced by Melisa D. Monts and Diamond MPrint Productions

Edited by Diane Kang 

 

At last! Kate and Leisha finally answer some more questions from listeners in this week’s episode. They discuss what they hope to see happen for their characters in “The L Word”, how to declutter even if you love being surrounded by stuff, and Leisha’s spontaneous cameo in the famous ‘coming out’ episode of Ellen Degeneres’s sitcom!


Send Us Your Questions:

Call In: 323-577-4606

Write In: kateandleisha@gmail.com

 

Follow us on Instagram @ThePantsPod

Email us: kateandleisha@gmail.com

Music: Carol Parra @csssuxxx

Artwork: Lovefoxxx


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
